about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Experience the fastest rail line in America, from modern suburbia to sprawling countryside, linking the state capitals of Massachusetts and Rhode Island, in command of both Amtrak® Regional and MBTA Commuter operations with Train Sim World 3: Northeast Corridor: Boston - Providence.

It’s a new dawn, it’s a new day, the Northeast Corridor: Boston - Providence route now features the same volumetric skies and lighting as introduced in Train Sim World 3!

Celebrate American rail with the Train Sim World 3: US Super Bundle!

Hurry long-distance passengers on Northeast Regional services between the two state capitals with the modern Amtrak ACS-64 and climb aboard the striking MBTA F40PH-3C, operating commuter services between each suburban hub along the way, as well as on the quaint Stoughton branch.

The Boston and Providence Railroad dates back to the 1830s, making it one of the United States’ oldest railroads. Making travel easier than ever, the line played a part in the development of America’s commuter suburbs, a purpose which the line still serves to this day. Now part of the Northeast Corridor, with both MBTA and Amtrak at the helm, bustling commuter and high speed operations frequent the line hundreds of times a day.

Choose how you want to play; operate trains, ride around as a passenger, complete the route tasks, or simply pick a vantage point and watch the action unfold. Create your own experiences with the Scenario Planner and Livery Designer and share them on Creators Club. Whatever you choose to do, there's lots to see and experience in Train Sim World 3: Northeast Corridor: Boston - Providence.

Key Features


  • 43-mile (70 km) route from Boston, Massachusetts to Providence, Rhode Island
  • 4-mile (7 km) branch from Canton Junction to Stoughton
  • Now upgraded with Train Sim World 3 standard volumetric skies and lighting
  • Includes the ACS-64 electric locomotive and Amfleet cars in Amtrak livery
  • Also includes ACS-64 No. 662 in Amtrak Phase III Train Sim World 2 livery
  • Includes the F40PH-3C diesel locomotive, single deck cars & cab car in MBTA livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • Accurate true-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Training Modules
  • Includes 5 Scenarios and an extensive 24-hour Timetable
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 5.3 GB
